front.title: Remote Authentication Dial In User Service (RADIUS) Protocol Extensions

abstract.t: The Remote Authentication Dial In User Service (RADIUS) protocol isnearing exhaustion of its current 8-bit attribute type space. Inaddition, experience shows a growing need for complex grouping, alongwith attributes which can carry more than 253 octets of data. Thisdocument defines changes to RADIUS which address all of the aboveproblems.
